data.title: Noshi Gilani Poetry - Noshi Gilani
data.meta_description:
Ye Naam Mumkin Nahi Rahay Ga, Muqaam Mumkin Nahi Rahay Ga
Gharoor Lehjay Mein Aa Gaya Tou Kalaam Mumkin Nahi Rahay Ga
Ye Barf Mausam Jo Sheher-e-Jaa.n Mein...
data.meta_site_name: Tafreeh Mela - Pakistani Urdu Forum | urdu shayari | Urdu Novel | Urdu Islam
data.text:
*Sarlaa*

Moderator

Apr 16, 2013

17,846

7,109

363

33

Pakistan.. karachi

#1

Ye Naam Mumkin Nahi Rahay Ga, Muqaam Mumkin Nahi Rahay Ga

Gharoor Lehjay Mein Aa Gaya Tou Kalaam Mumkin Nahi Rahay Ga

Ye Barf Mausam Jo Sheher-e-Jaa.n Mein Kuch Aur Lamhay Theher Gaya Tou

Lahoo Ka Dil Ki Kisi Gali Mein Muqaam Mumkin Nahi Rahay Ga

Tum Apni Saanson Se Meri Saansain Alag Tou Karnay Lagay Ho Laikin

Jo Kaam Aasaan Samajh Rahay Ho Wo Kaam Mumkin Nahi Rahay Ga

Wafaa Ka Kaaghaz Tou Bheeg Jaye Ga Badgumaani Ki Baarishon Mein

Khaton Ki Baatain Tou Khwaab Hon Gi Payaam Mumkin Nahi Rahay Ga

Mein Jaanti Hun Mujhe Yaqeen Hai Agar Kabhi TU Mujhe Bhula De

Tou Teri Aanhkon Mein Roshni Ka Qayaam Mumkin Nahi Rahay Ga

Ye Ham Mohabbat Mein La Ta’alluq Se Ho Rahay Hain Tou Dekh Laina

Duaaein Tou Khair Kon De Ga Salaam Mumkin Nahi Rahay Ga

…

*Sarlaa*

Moderator

Apr 16, 2013

17,846

7,109

363

33

Pakistan.. karachi

#2

Bohat Aaraam Karna Chahti Hun

Yehi Ek Kaam Karna Chahti Hun

Shaoor-e-Aagahi Ek Almiaa Hai

Ise Neelaam Karna Chahti Hun

Mein Apni Umer Ke Saaray Asaasay

Tumhaaray Naam Karna Chahti Hun

Tumharay Khaima-e-Khushbuu Mein Reh Kar

Mein Subaah-o-Shaam Karna Chahti Hun

Charaaghon Se Hawaa Ki Dushmani Hai

Ise Naakaam Karna Chahti Hun

…

*Sarlaa*

Moderator

Apr 16, 2013

17,846

7,109

363

33

Pakistan.. karachi

#3

Yeh hum hi jantey hain judaai ke morr par,

Iss dil ka jo bhi haal tujhe dekh kar hua..

…

*Sarlaa*

Moderator

Apr 16, 2013

17,846

7,109

363

33

Pakistan.. karachi

#4

Shaam Ko Sogwaar Kartay Rahay

Ham Tera Intezaar Kartay Rahay

TU Tou Kaar-e-Jahan Mein Tha Masroof

Aur Hum Tujh Se Pyaar Kartay Rahay

Kis Lye Vasl Ki Kahani Mein

Hijr Ko Hissaydaar Kartay Rahay

Dil Ko Bas Mubtala-e-Gham Rakha

Wehshaton Ka Shumaar Kartay Rahay

…

Reactions: Sizzler_eiz

*Sarlaa*

Moderator

Apr 16, 2013

17,846

7,109

363

33

Pakistan.. karachi

#5

Ek Shab-e-Mehtaab Se Bhaagtay Phirtay Hain

Ham Kiun Apnay Aap Se Bhaagtay Phirtay Hain

Pyaas Ki Shiddat Honton Ki Taqdeer Howi

Aur Ham Qatraa-e-Aab Se Bhaagtay Phirtay Hain

Shaam Dhalay Saari Choupaalain Sajti Hain

Ham Apnay Ehbaab Se Bhaagtay Phirtay Hain

Khushbuu Ki Tehreer Badan Per Likhi Hai

Aur Safaid Gulaab Se Bhaagtay Phirtay Hain

Ik Kitaab Lye Phirtay Hain Haathon Mein

Aur Zar-o-Asbaab Se Bhaagtay Phirtay Hain

Unhain Kisi Taabeer Ki Khwaahish Kia Hogi ?

Loog Jo Arsaa-e-Khwaab Se Bhaagtay Phirtay Hain

Aankhon Mein Be-Taab Samandar Hai Phir Bhi

Jaanay Kis Gardaab Se Bhaagtay Phirtay Hain

…

*Sarlaa*

Moderator

Apr 16, 2013

17,846

7,109

363

33

Pakistan.. karachi

#6

Jaanay Kaisay Sambhaal Kar Rakhay

Sab Iraaday Sambhaal Kar Rakhay

Kuch Naye Rang Hain Mohabbat Ke

Kuch Puraanay Sambhaal Kar Rakhay

Mausam-e-Ishq Teri Baarish Mein

Khat Jo Bheegay Sambhaal Kar Rakhay

Jin Ki Khushbu Udaas Karti Thi

Wo Bhi Gajray Sambhaal Kar Rakhay

Tujh Se Milnay Ke Aur Bichadnay Ke

Saaray Khadshay Sambhaal Kar Rakhay

Jab Hawaa Ka Mizaaj Barham Tha

Ham Ne Pat’tay Sambhaal Kar Rakhay

Aarzoo Ke Haseen Pinjray Mein

Kuch Parinday Sambhaal Kar Rakhay

Ham Ne Dil Ki Kitaab Mein Tere

Saaray Waaday Sambhaal Kar Rakhay

Tere Dukh Ke Tamaam Hee Mausam

Ay Zamaanay Sambhaal Kar Rakhay

Mere Khwaabon Ko Raakh Kar Daala

Aur Apnay Sambhaal Kar Rakhay

…

Reactions: Haya_Fatima

*Sarlaa*

Moderator

Apr 16, 2013

17,846

7,109

363

33

Pakistan.. karachi

#7

Umer Raaigaa.n Kardi Tab Ye Baat Maani Hai

Mout Aur Mohabbat Ki Ek Hee Kahani Hai

Khail Jo Bhi Tha Jaana.n Ab Hisaab Kia Karna

Jeet Jis Kisi Ho Ham Ne Haar Maani Hai

Vasl Per Bhee Naadim Thay Hijr Per Bhi Sharmindah

Wo Bhi Raaigaani Thi Ye Bhi Raaigaani Hai

Ye Mera Hunar Teri Khusbuoun Se Waabasta

Mere Saaray Lafzon Per Teri Hukmarani Hai

Jaanay Kon Shehzaadah Kab Chura Ke Le Jaaye

Wo Jo Apne Aangan Mein Khusbuoun Ki Rani Hai

…

*Sarlaa*

Moderator

Apr 16, 2013

17,846

7,109

363

33

Pakistan.. karachi

#8

Khauf Ki Shab Mein Hont Seenay Se

Marna Behtar Hai Aisay Jeenay Se

Kuch Tou Qaayim Rahay Anaa Ka Bharam

Dekhna Hai Ose Qareenay Se

Yun Tamasha Tou Osko Hona Tha

Jo Ghiri Aarzoo Ke Zeenay Se

Kuch Hawaaon Ka Aitbaar Nahi

Warna Kia Khauf Os Safeenay Se

Dil Ka Ab Talkhion Se Naata Hai

Lutf Laita Hai Zeher Peenay Se

…

Reactions: Haya_Fatima

*Sarlaa*

Moderator

Apr 16, 2013

17,846

7,109

363

33

Pakistan.. karachi

#9

Hai Mohabbat Azaab, Barbaadi

Dil Ko Ye Baat Kis Ne Samjha Di ?

Be-Wafai Ne Khaak Kar Daali

Chaahaton Ki Hari Bhari Daali

Ik Shab Vasl Ki Guzaarish Thi

Os Ne Tasveer Apni Bhijvadi

Tere Gham Ki Jazeerah-e-Dil Mein

Phailti Jaa Rahi Hai Aabaadi

Kis Qadar Baanjh Hoti Jaati Hai

Takht-e-Ikhlaas Teri Shehzaadi

Waqt Zaalim Tha Meri Har Khwaahish

Os Ne Deewaar-e-Gham Mein Chunwa Di

…

*Sarlaa*

Moderator

Apr 16, 2013

17,846

7,109

363

33

Pakistan.. karachi

#10

Zamaney walon se chup ke roney ke din nahin hain,

Usey kehna yeh udaas honey ke din nahin hain,

Main jaan sakti hoon vasl mein asal bhaid kya hai,

Magar haqeeqat shanaas honey ke din nahin hain,

Hamara khud se makaalma* bhi neya neya hai,

Kisi badamn ka libaas honey ke din nahin hain,

Abhi to aankhon mein aanusyon ki nami hai baqi,

Zameen-e-dil par pyaas boney ke din nahin hain..

*Sarlaa*

Moderator

Apr 16, 2013

17,846

7,109

363

33

Pakistan.. karachi

#11

Shab-e-wehshat ki aadat ho gayi hai,

Mujhe tum se mohabbat ho gayi hai,

Kisi ka lamss hai jis ke hunnar se,

Mukammal sab ibaadat ho gayi hai,

Koi din ke liye deewangi bhi,

Mere dil ko ghaneemat ho gayi hai,

Bohat behaal rehte they magar ab,

Humain hijrat ki aadat ho gayi hai,

Gulaab asaar rastey muntazir hai,

Ke mausam ki inaayat ho gayi hai,

Zameen se aasman tak roshni hai,

Meherbaan hum pe fitrat* ho gayi hai..

*Sarlaa*

Moderator

Apr 16, 2013

17,846

7,109

363

33

Pakistan.. karachi

#12

Raaston Mein Rahay Na Ghar Mein Rahay

Umer Bhar Haalat-e-Safar Mein Rahay

Lafz Saaray Charaagh Ban Jayein

Vasf Aisa Mere Hunar Mein Rahay

Zeher Saara Shajar Mein Aa Jaye

Ay Khuda Zindagi Samar Mein Rahay

Is Lye Gardishon Ko Paala Hai

Koi Tou Halqa-e-Asar Mein Rahay

Ek Zamaana Gharon Mein Tha Aabaad

Be-Ghar Ham Teri Nazron Mein Rahay

…

*Sarlaa*

Moderator

Apr 16, 2013

17,846

7,109

363

33

Pakistan.. karachi

#13

Kahbi yeh chup main kabhi meri baat baat main tha,

Tumhara akss meri saari kayenaat mein tha,

Hum ehl-e-ishq bohat bd’gumaan hote hain,

Isi tarah ka koi vasf* teri zaat mein tha..

Reactions: Sizzler_eiz

*Sarlaa*

Moderator

Apr 16, 2013

17,846

7,109

363

33

Pakistan.. karachi

#14

Hamaray Bas Mein Agar Apne Faislay Hotay

Tou Hum Kubhi Ke Gharon Ko Palat Gaye Hotay

Qareeb Reh Ke Sulaghnay Se Kitna Behtar Tha

Kisi Muqaam Per Hum Tum Bicharr Gaye Hotay

Kubhi Toryat Ko Ham Muthion Mein Bhar Letay

Kubhi Hawaaon Se Apne Mukaalmay Hotay

Hamaray Naam Pe Koi Charaagh Tou Jalta

Kisi Zabaan Pe Hamaray Bhi Tazkaray Hotay

Ham Apna Koi Alag Raasta Bana Letay

Hamaray Dil Ne Agar Hoslay Kye Hotay

…

*Sarlaa*

Moderator

Apr 16, 2013

17,846

7,109

363

33

Pakistan.. karachi

#15

Mohabbat se rihaa hona zaroori ho geya hai,

Mera tujh se judaa hona zaroori ho geya hai,

Wafaa ke tajarbey karte huye to umar guzri,

Zara sa bewafa hona zaroori ho geya hai,

Meri awaaz tanhaai main marti ja rahi hai,

Kisi ka ham’nawaa hona zaroori ho geya hai,

Azaab zulmat-e-shab hai ke ab dil ke labon par,

Koi harf-e-duaa hona zaroori ho geya hai..

…

*Sarlaa*

Moderator

Apr 16, 2013

17,846

7,109

363

33

Pakistan.. karachi

#16

Khayaal-o-Khwaab Ke Manzar Sajaana Chahta Hai

Ye Dil Jeenay Ka Ik Taaza Bahana Chahta Hai

Roshnion Ke Saaray Manzar Jhootay Lagtay Hain

Laikin Oski aankh Ke aansuu Sachay Lagtay Hain

Ik Chaadar Sakhan Hee Bacha Kar Nikal Chalain

Rasta Milay Tou Sheher Se Baahir Nikal Chalain

Marqad-e-Ishq Pe ab aur Na Roya Jaaye

Raat Ka Pichla Peher Hai Chalo Soya Jaaye

…

*Sarlaa*

Moderator

Apr 16, 2013

17,846

7,109

363

33

Pakistan.. karachi

#17

Aankhain Bhi Wohi Hain Tou Dareecha Bhi Wohi Hai

Aur Soch Ke Aangan Mein Utarta Bhi Wohi Hai

Jis Ne Mere Jazbon Ki Sadaaqat Ko Na Jaana

Ab Meri Rafaaqat Ko Tarasta Bhi Wohi Hai

Is Dil Ke Kharaabay Se Guzar Kis Ka Howa Hai ?

Aankhain Bhi Wohi, Hont Bhi, Lehja Bhi Wohi Hai

Jo Kuch Bhi Kaha Tha Meri Tanhaayi Ne Tujh Se

Is Sheher Ki Deewar Pe Likha Bhi Wohi Hai

Wo Jis Ne Dye Mujhko Mohabbat Ke Khazaanay

Baadal Ki Tarah Aankh Se Barsaa Bhi Wohi Hai

…

*Sarlaa*

Moderator

Apr 16, 2013

17,846

7,109

363

33

Pakistan.. karachi

#18

Ye Umar Bhar Ka Safar aur Ye Raaigaani Teri

Kahan Gayi Ay Mere Dil Wo Khush Gumaani Teri ?

Yahan Pe Kon Andheron Mein Saath Chalta Hai ?

TU Ab Bhee Saath Mere Hai Ye Meherbaani Teri

Tujhe Khabar Nahee Hum Dekh Kar Bohat Roye

Nayi Kitaab Mein Tasweer Ik Puraani Teri

Abhe Se aablay Parnay Lagay Hain Paon Mein

Abhe Tou Door Hai Manzil Safar Kahaani Teri

Bhulaaye Baithay Hain aur Apnay Haal Mein Khush Hain

TU aake Dekh Ke Kubhi Hum Ne Baat Maani Teri

…

*Sarlaa*

Moderator

Apr 16, 2013

17,846

7,109

363

33

Pakistan.. karachi

#19

Safar Malaal Ka Hai Aur Chal Rahi Huun Mei

Ghubaar-e-Shab Ki Udasi Mei Dhal Rahi Huun Mei

Ajeeb Barf Ki Barish Badan Pe Utri Hei

Ke Jis Ki Aag Mei Chup Chaap Jal Rahi Huun Mei

Phir Ik Charaagh Jala Shaam Ki Haveli Mein

Phir Ik Dard Se Aakhir Sambhal Rahi Huun Mei

Ye Rakh Rakhaao Usay Jaanay Naheen De Ga

Ke Apne Aap Mei Kaisay Pighal Rahi Huun Mei

Ye Ishq Sach Se Juda Kaisay Ho Gaya Jaana?

Ab Is Sawaal Se Bahar Nikal Rahi Huun Mei

Bas Ik Ishq Meri Zaat Per Saheefa Ho

Mere Khuda! Ye Aqeeda Badal Rahi Huun Mei..!!

…
